nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.application

Class ChapsChallenge

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.application.ChapsChallenge

  • public class ChapsChallenge
extends java.lang.Object
    Chip and Chap. Chap’s challenge is a creative clone of the (first level of the) 1989 Atari game Chips Challenge. To learn more about Chip’s Challenge. ChapsChallenge maintains the functionality of the game. It also provides the link between the Maze, Renderer and Persistence packages.

      • move

        public void move(Tile.Direction direction)
        Moves the player in the direction specified. Checks if the tile is able to be moved onto by interacting with it. If valid, it sets the location of the player to the new tile.
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction to move in.
